titleStmt.title: An Account of the sentence which past upon Titus Oates (upon conviction of horrid perjuries) at the Kings Bench-bar, Saturday, May 16th, 1685 : also a relation of his behavior in the Kings Bench-prison ever since his convictions (viz.) May 8 & 9.

publicationStmt.publisher: Reprinted by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Originally printed: London : Printed for A. Banks, 1685.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
